issue.title: Integral tie-back in AtlasPlugin.cpp seems wrong - causes control glitches

content.raw: It was pretty easy to hit this even with a step of 0.1 radians on the shoulder / shx joint.  p= 500, i = 100, i_limit = 170, d=20.  Given that it was so easy to hit with a relatively small step, I don't think it should always be on.  Your suggestion to allow disabling it seems very reasonable.
content.html: It was pretty easy to hit this even with a step of 0.1 radians on the shoulder / shx joint. p= 500, i = 100, i_limit = 170, d=20. Given that it was so easy to hit with a relatively small step, I don't think it should always be on. Your suggestion to allow disabling it seems very reasonable.
